reviews.text: Beautiful garden with plenty of fountains and wonderful scenery. Not very big but definitely worth the trip.
It's a park that could be enjoyed for all the family (and free). It's better to have a picnic there, because there are not any bar nor restaurant.

Close to the UB taking diagonal from rambla de Brazil there is a nice palm road where you can heard chirping birds and pigeons. The palacio Real offer a nice walk with A playground at the west side.
We went after raining and look awesome.
